title: Github Developer Dynamics
description: This project intends to analyse the effect of development activity on 6 AI crypto projects by analyzing token price correlations and Reddit Data.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: This is a project made to have a personal Portfolio weebpage to learn React by building a useful webpage to present myself.

title: Deciphering Crypto Trends
description: This project is part of the OCEAN Data Challenge competition. The challenge consists in analysing the google trends for several cryptocurrencies and their relation to the token price. At the end a model is built to forecast upcoming trends.
